ygData.subject: RE: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: An idea for the slow day)
ygData.msgSnippet: In AC you have different colors of clothing and armor for almost every part of the body. (and if you don t have clothes, you go naked. BlackHorse ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
In AC you have different colors of clothing and armor for almost every part
of the body. (and if you don't have clothes, you go naked.

BlackHorse

-----Original Message-----
From: Dave [mailto:kagtuol@...]
Sent: Saturday, August 28, 1999 1:28 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: [EQ-Monks] An idea for
the slow day)


From: "Dave" <kagtuol@...>


For enhanced graphics, I think there should be an optional download...
maybe some people would want to download a 300 MB file. I know i would
want to. Im tired of everyone looking the same anyhow. I hear that in
Asheron's Call everyone looks much different from each other than they do in
EQ. Maybe the next EQ addon will address this (if there is one, more $ for
Verant).

Sleet
Brell Serilis
